languages.text: {n}Женщина легко смахивает прядь черных волос и замирает.{/n} "А... а наши с вами совместные дела, шерин... Если вы пожелаете — я останусь вашим верным партнером. Равным партнером". {n}Последние слова Джай выделяет особенно жарко.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина легко смахивает прядь черных волос и замирает.{/n} "А... а наши с вами совместные дела, шерин... Если вы пожелаете — я останусь вашим верным партнером. Равным партнером". {n}Последние слова Джай выделяет особенно жарко.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊随手拂去一缕黑发，静立当场。{/n}“至于……我们共同的生意，亲爱的……如果你愿意的话，我今后依然会是你忠诚的伙伴，是你平等的伙伴。”{n}她尤为热切地吐出了最后几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊随手拂去一缕黑发，静立当场。{/n}“至于……我们共同的生意，亲爱的……如果你愿意的话，我今后依然会是你忠诚的伙伴，是你平等的伙伴。”{n}她尤为热切地吐出了最后几个字。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae aparta con indiferencia un mechón de pelo moreno y se queda quieta.{/n} «En cuanto a nuestro... acuerdo mutuo, shereen... seguiré siendo su leal compañera si lo desea. En igualdad de condiciones». {n}Pronuncia las últimas palabras con especial vehemencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae aparta con indiferencia un mechón de pelo moreno y se queda quieta.{/n} «En cuanto a nuestro... acuerdo mutuo, shereen... seguiré siendo su leal compañera si lo desea. En igualdad de condiciones». {n}Pronuncia las últimas palabras con especial vehemencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイはさりげなく黒髪の束を払い、そして静止した。{/n}「お互いの仕事については…あんたが望むなら、あたしは忠実なパートナーであり続けるわ。対等なパートナーとして、ね」{n}彼女は最後の数語を特に強調するように口にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはさりげなく黒髪の束を払い、そして静止した。{/n}「お互いの仕事については…あんたが望むなら、あたしは忠実なパートナーであり続けるわ。対等なパートナーとして、ね」{n}彼女は最後の数語を特に強調するように口にした。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae wischt beiläufig eine Strähne schwarzer Haare beiseite und hält dann inne.{/n} "Was unsere ... gemeinsamen Geschäfte angeht, Shereen ... Wenn Ihr es wünscht, so bleibe ich Eure treue Partnerin. Eine ebenbürtige Partnerin." {n}Die letzten Worte spricht sie mit besonderer Vehemenz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae wischt beiläufig eine Strähne schwarzer Haare beiseite und hält dann inne.{/n} "Was unsere ... gemeinsamen Geschäfte angeht, Shereen ... Wenn Ihr es wünscht, so bleibe ich Eure treue Partnerin. Eine ebenbürtige Partnerin." {n}Die letzten Worte spricht sie mit besonderer Vehemenz.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Jae écarte une mèche de cheveux noirs de son visage, puis s'immobilise.{/n} « Quant à... nos affaires mutuelles, shereen... Je resterai votre loyale partenaire si vous le désirez. Une partenaire sur un pied d'égalité, » {n}déclare-t-elle en insistant impétueusement sur ces derniers mots.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Jae écarte une mèche de cheveux noirs de son visage, puis s'immobilise.{/n} « Quant à... nos affaires mutuelles, shereen... Je resterai votre loyale partenaire si vous le désirez. Une partenaire sur un pied d'égalité, » {n}déclare-t-elle en insistant impétueusement sur ces derniers mots.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae durgunlaşıyor, siyah saçının bir buklesini okşayıp ardından hareketsizleşiyor.{/n} "Birlikte yürüttüğümüz işlere gelirsek şirinim, arzularsan sadık ortağın olarak kalırım. Dengin olurum." {n}Son cümlesini özellikle hararetli bir şekilde söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae casually brushes away a strand of black hair and then stills.{/n} "As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae durgunlaşıyor, siyah saçının bir buklesini okşuyor, ardından hareketsizleşiyor.{/n} "Ortak çalışmalarımıza gelirsek şirinim, eğer arzularsan senin sadık partnerin olarak kalacağım. Denk konumda bir partner." {n}Bu son sözleri özellikle hararetli bir şekilde söylüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
